TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationCredentials extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationCredentials Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 为使用基于表单的身份验证的 ASP.NET 应用程序配置用户凭据。

span.span: Configures user credentials for ASP.NET applications that use form-based authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的 `authentication` 部分中 `forms` 节的 `credentials` 元素的方法。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `credentials` element of a `forms` section in the `authentication` section of the configuration file. 此类型是包含 、和 类型的组的一部分。This type is part of a group that includes the , the , and the types. 除集合类型之外，所有其他都直接影响基础配置标记。With the exception of the collection type, all the others directly affect the underlying configuration tags. > [!NOTE] > 可以根据 定义的限制，将信息写入配置文件的相关部分。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by . 在层次结构中不允许在配置文件中写入的任何尝试都会导致分析器生成错误消息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 但是，可以使用此类在层次结构中的任何级别上读取配置信息。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. 为安全起见，建议使用外部存储库（如数据库）来保留用户的凭据。For safety and scalability, it is recommended that you use an external repository, such as a database, to keep the users' credentials. ## Examples 此示例演示如何以声明方式为 `credentials` 节的几个属性指定值，也可以将这些属性作为 类的成员进行访问。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `credentials` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式为 `credentials` 节指定值。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `credentials` section. ``` ``` 此示例使用 SHA1。This example uses SHA1. 由于与 SHA1 冲突，Microsoft 建议使用 SHA256。Due to collision problems with SHA1, Microsoft recommends SHA256. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用 `credentials` 部分，请确保遵循[ASP.NET Authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100))中所述的准则。If you use the `credentials` section, be sure to follow the guidelines explained at [ASP.NET Authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/eeyk640h(v=vs.100)). 为了实现可伸缩性和更好的安全性，建议使用外部数据库来存储用户凭据。For scalability and better security, it is recommended that you use an external database to store the users' credentials. 若要详细了解如何构建安全的 ASP.NET 应用程序，请搜索 Microsoft MSDN 网站（https://msdn.microsoft.com) "保护您的 ASP.NET 应用程序" 和 "构建安全 ASP.NET 应用程序：身份验证、授权和安全通信"。For more information about building secure ASP.NET applications, search the Microsoft MSDN Web site (https://msdn.microsoft.com) for "Securing Your ASP.NET Application" and "Building Secure ASP.NET Applications: Authentication, Authorization, and Secure Communication." 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials/CS/formsauthenticationcredentials.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationCredentials/VB/formsauthenticationcredentials.vb#1)]
